alert.note: Alert for Bremer; Butler (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 10:25AM CST until January 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Icing is Diminishing Across the Area... .Freezing rain is diminishing across the area, with temperatures rising above freezing over southern parts of the area while over far northwest Iowa the precipitation will transition to snow. The next round of light to moderate snow is expected later this afternoon and into Wednesday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain ending later this morning as temperatures rise above freezing. * WHERE...Portions of north central Iowa. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Icy conditions on walkways and roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org, or dial 511.
